title: (x) Microsoft Office and Live Labs font - Franklin, Segoe {Jan Erdmann, Lex Kominek}
content:
What are these typefaces?

Previous Office logo:  
 [http://blackboard.uic.edu/webapps/lobj-expo-bb\_bb60/user/garay/ITL\_Blog/...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611192334/http:/blackboard.uic.edu/webapps/lobj-expo-bb_bb60/user/garay/ITL_Blog/Home?cmd=GetImage&systemId=Office2003.logo__0.jpg "http://blackboard.uic.edu/webapps/lobj-expo-bb\_bb60/user/garay/ITL\_Blog/Home?cmd=GetImage&systemId=Office2003.logo\_\_0.jpg")

Current Office logo:  
 [http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/6/65/MS\_Office\_2010\_Logo.svg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611192334/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/6/65/MS_Office_2010_Logo.svg "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/6/65/MS\_Office\_2010\_Logo.svg")

Live Labs logo:  
 [http://livelabs.com/files/themes/labs/images/logo\_livelabs-mask\_ALL.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611192334/http:/livelabs.com/files/themes/labs/images/logo_livelabs-mask_ALL.png "http://livelabs.com/files/themes/labs/images/logo\_livelabs-mask\_ALL.png")
author: chimerical

comments.content: I think the newer ones are [Segoe](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611192334/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Segoe).

The old one looks like Franklin.

- Lex
That makes sense they would be using those. Thanks all!
